title: Heroic Quest- A simple guide to happiness
description: Personal development / Motivational / Inspirational / Self help.Written in a witty, conversational style, ‘Heroic Quest’ provides a guide to achieving lasting, authentic happiness. It is a humorous, easy to read, collection of tools, tips, facts and 365 quotes, providing practical advice on becoming the hero of your own life and living happily right now.The Heroic Quest Philosophy : Today is the most important day of your life. Challenges & tests are unavoidable. Happiness requires daily effort.
author: Philip D. Groom
